head.name: xhtml-collapsible
head.title: XHTML Collapsible Tree
head.author: Juliano F. Ravasi
head.descr: This stylesheet can be used to generate a XHTML page listing your media library in a collapsible tree. Files and directories are listed using icons and different colors, making them easily recognizable. Each directory has a "plus" icon before its folder icon, which expands its contents when clicked.

param.name: support-dir
param.descr: Relative path to the directory where support files (stylesheets, images and scripts) can be found. Should not end with a '/'.

param.name: href-base
param.descr: When specified, <a> links are generated for each file using this string as a prefix for the href attribute.
